title: Putrid demonspawn
data:
***Obsolete**: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.*

*For a list of all demonspawn, see [list of demonspawn](/List_of_demonspawn "List of demonspawn").*

| - | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A half-mortal, half-demonic creature, with its hellish heritage asserting itself through a certain devilish cast to its features. It is surrounded by sickly fumes and gases. |

## Useful Info

**Putrid demonspawn** are demonspawn with a passive ability similar to the [Powered by Death](/Powered_by_Death "Powered by Death") demonspawn mutation. They can be found in the [Pandemonium](/Pandemonium "Pandemonium") and guarding it's portals in the [Depths](/Depths "Depths").

## Tips & Tricks

Try to get them in an area without [corpses](/Corpse "Corpse"), as nearby corpses will increase their regeneration rate. Try not to use poison against them unless you have access to lethal poison, since they have weak [poison resistance](/Poison_resistance "Poison resistance"). Like all demonspawn, they are also vulnerable to holy weapons and [silver](/Silver "Silver"), so use those if you have them.

## History

- Putrid demonspawn were removed in [0.19](/0.19 "0.19")
- Putrid demonspawn were added in [0.14](/0.14 "0.14").
html:
Putrid demonspawn

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Obsolete: This article refers to an aspect of the game which has been removed. It is retained for historical reference only.

For a list of all demonspawn, see list of demonspawn.

putrid demonspawn 6 
HP 38-62
HD 10
XP 667
Speed 10
AC 3
EV 13
Will 40
Attack1 20 (hit: plain)


Resistances rPois+
Vulnerabilities Holy, Holy wrath,
Silver
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Weapons & armour
Starting equipment
Open doors
Holiness Natural
Size Medium
Type demonspawn, putrid demonspawn
Flags Always corpse
No poly
Speaks
Warm-blooded
A half-mortal, half-demonic creature, with its hellish heritage asserting itself through a certain devilish cast to its features.


It is surrounded by sickly fumes and gases.

Useful Info

Putrid demonspawn are demonspawn with a passive ability similar to the Powered by Death demonspawn mutation. They can be found in the Pandemonium and guarding it's portals in the Depths.

Tips & Tricks

Try to get them in an area without corpses, as nearby corpses will increase their regeneration rate. Try not to use poison against them unless you have access to lethal poison, since they have weak poison resistance. Like all demonspawn, they are also vulnerable to holy weapons and silver, so use those if you have them.

History

  • Putrid demonspawn were removed in 0.19
  • Putrid demonspawn were added in 0.14.
